query_description: Vote Type Distribution Over Time (90 days: 2022-06-27 to 2022-09-24)

observations.finding: Upvotes (type 2) dominate at ~35,000-42,000 per weekday. Weekends show ~50% reduction to ~19,000-20,000 upvotes.
Reputation-affecting votes (types 1,2,3) account for ~85% of all daily votes. Upvotes (type 2) alone represent ~70% of all votes.
Strong weekday/weekend pattern. Saturdays and Sundays consistently show 45-50% lower activity across all vote types. This suggests users earn reputation primarily during work hours.
Deletion votes (type 10) average ~2,400/day weekdays, suggesting active content moderation. Bounty activity (types 8,9) is minimal at ~50/day.
